1: God is my refuge and strength, helping me always.
2: I find strength and courage in the face of challenges.
3: I find calm strength even in the storms around me.
4: A river brings joy to the heart of the city.
5: I am strong and supported in every challenge I face.
6: Nature responds powerfully to the strength of his voice.
7: I find refuge in the presence of a supportive force.
8: I appreciate the beauty of the wonders in the world.
9: Peace fills the world as conflict ends and strength transforms.
10: I find peace in knowing the greatness around me.
11: I find strength and safety in a guiding presence.
